title: Which is easier, online classes or non-online? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A. Which is easier, online classes or non-online? On-campus courses that are being offered online in order to reduce the spread of COVID-19 have the same level of difficulty. They may even have the same level of personal attention.

In this pandemic situation online classes has proved to be more helpful and its convenient to join online classes at your own comfortable level. you can check planetspark website they are offering some good online courses.
